title: error in create training dataset
body:
### Is there an existing issue for this?

- [X] I have searched the existing issues

### Bug description

I am using the GUI to do training a tracking task and after I have labeled the data, the next step is to create a training dataset, but I got this error:

```
python -m deeplabcut
Loading DLC 2.3rc3...
Starting GUI...
Traceback (most recent call last):
  File "C:\Users\Marco.VPP\Miniconda3\envs\dlc\lib\site-packages\deeplabcut\gui\tabs\create_training_dataset.py", line 88, in create_training_dataset
    deeplabcut.create_multianimaltraining_dataset(
  File "C:\Users\Marco.VPP\Miniconda3\envs\dlc\lib\site-packages\deeplabcut\generate_training_dataset\multiple_individuals_trainingsetmanipulation.py", line 203, in create_multianimaltraining_dataset
    Data = merge_annotateddatasets(cfg, full_training_path)
  File "C:\Users\Marco.VPP\Miniconda3\envs\dlc\lib\site-packages\deeplabcut\generate_training_dataset\trainingsetmanipulation.py", line 479, in merge_annotateddatasets
    conversioncode.guarantee_multiindex_rows(data)
  File "C:\Users\Marco.VPP\Miniconda3\envs\dlc\lib\site-packages\deeplabcut\utils\conversioncode.py", line 247, in guarantee_multiindex_rows
    df.index = df.index.set_levels(df.index.levels[1].astype(str), level=1)
  File "C:\Users\Marco.VPP\Miniconda3\envs\dlc\lib\site-packages\pandas\core\indexes\frozen.py", line 73, in __getitem__
    return super().__getitem__(n)
IndexError: list index out of range
```

I think that somehow the dataframe read from the .h5 file is not multiindex. 
How should I fix this?

PS: my "individuals" are not all present in all frames, and sometimes one or more of their "bodyparts" are not present because of occlusion. May this be a problem?

thanks in advance.

### Operating System

windows

### DeepLabCut version

dlc version 2.3rc3

### DeepLabCut mode

multi animal

### Device type

gpu

### Steps To Reproduce

_No response_

### Relevant log output

_No response_

### Anything else?

_No response_
